def_cn: （用于名词后构成副词）表示“关于”，“在…方面”
def_en: -wise is added to nouns to form adverbs indicating that something is the case when considering the particular thing mentioned.

def_cn: （用于名词后构成副词）表示“像…一样”，“如同”
def_en: -wise is added to nouns to form adverbs indicating that someone behaves in the same way as the person or thing that is mentioned.
